import React, { useState, useRef } from 'react'; import ImageSlideshow from './components/imageslideshow'; import Navigation from './components/Navigation'; import RsvpModal from './components/RsvpModal'; import Modal from './components/Modal'; export default function WeddingSite() { const [isNavOpen, setIsNavOpen] = useState(false); const [isRsvpModalOpen, setIsRsvpModalOpen] = useState(false); const [modalMessage, setModalMessage] = useState(''); const mainContentRef = useRef(null); const sectionRefs = { schedule: useRef(null), menu: useRef(null), hotels: useRef(null), photos: useRef(null), games: useRef(null), spotify: useRef(null), registry: useRef(null), directions: useRef(null), }; const handleNavigate = (id) => { if (sectionRefs[id] && sectionRefs[id].current) { sectionRefs[id].current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' }); } }; const handleViewDetails = () => { if (sectionRefs.schedule && sectionRefs.schedule.current) { sectionRefs.schedule.current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' }); } }; return ( <> setIsRsvpModalOpen(false)} onSubmit={(message) => setModalMessage(message)} /> setModalMessage('')} />

Oklahoma City, OK, USA

↓

Schedule

Ceremony: 4:30 PM

Reception: 6:00 PM

Join us for an evening of celebration, dinner, and dancing following the ceremony.

Menu

Appetizer: Bruschetta with Balsamic Glaze

Entree: Herb-Crusted Chicken Breast with Garlic Mashed Potatoes

Sides: Seasonal Roasted Vegetables & Artisan Rolls

Photo Upload

Scan the QR codes at your table or click below to upload your photos from our special day!

Games

Bingo & an Over/Under Prop Bet will be available at the reception for some friendly fun!

Our Playlist

Help us build the soundtrack for our wedding night! Add your favorite songs to our collaborative playlist.

Registry

Your presence is the greatest gift of all. However, if you wish to honor us with a gift, we have registered at the following places:

Amazon Registry

Target Registry
